item.title: China Is Investigating Google Over Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Google’s limited presence in China gives Beijing room to hit back harder if President Donald Trump’s trade war escalates.

item.title: Federal Workers Sue to Disconnect DOGE Server
item.description: Two federal workers, citing reports that Elon Musk’s associates are operating an illegally connected email server at OPM, seek a restraining order.

item.title: Trump's Plan to Make European Cars More Expensive Has a Fatal Flaw
item.description: President Trump's threat of 25 percent tariffs on EU car imports could spark an automotive trade war—one that will result in higher prices for all and...

item.title: 10 Best Gifts for Women Who Are Over This Planet (2025)
item.description: She’s seen enough. She’s had enough. She can’t book a one-way ticket to the stars (yet), but these gifts will help her transcend this world.

item.title: Chris Anderson Is Giving TED Away to Whoever Has the Best Idea for Its Future
item.description: In an exclusive interview with WIRED, the British entrepreneur shares why it’s time to move on from TED.
